Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Echoing Local L here. Skated at 6pm last night. Contractors and the north golf course are in good shape and should set up nicely in the coming days. Wanted to call out for the classic skiers that there ARE tracks on both Contractors and the golf course. Contractors seemed better, golf course had some (easily avoidable) leaves here and there.

Stoney Creek Metropark (Shelby Township).conditions: Almost all trails have fresh park set tracks, but exposed areas were sometimes drifted over. There are some oak leave patches in the woods where deer have been digging for acorns. Despite these issues skiing was the best I've seen at Stoney in a long time,

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Nubs has an 18 inch groomed in hardpack  base . Today a fresh groom of new snow made for hero skiing . It was cold : but LF 6 made it work . And the wind was light . Excellent !

nubsNob.nightSkiing: Tuesday thru Saturday from 5:30 to 9:00 p.m.
nubsNob.comments: It's another cold and beautiful start to the day at Nub's Nob with some sunshine forecast. The snow is machine groomed and in excellent shape. Speed Series is at 7:00 p.m. tonight on Valley. The soup of the day is clam chowder. Pintail Peak Lodge is open with food and an espresso bar. The lifts will spin from 9:00 a.m to 9:00 p.m. with an hour break at 4:30 p.m. Make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
